price: Ia menyeru selain Allah, sesuatu yang tidak dapat memberi mudarat dan tidak (pula) memberi manfaat kepadanya. Yang demikian itu adalah kesesatan yang jauh.
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا يَضُرُّهُۥ وَمَا لَا يَنفَعُهُۥۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلضَّلَٰلُ ٱلۡبَعِيدُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū min dūni al-lahi mā lā yaḍurruhu wamā lā yanfaʿuhu dhālika huwa al-ḍalālu al-baʿīdu
